text: Allaha janapadabasidera kacha theke tamra rasulake ya diyechena, ta allahara, rasulera, tamra atniya-sbajanera, iyatimadera, abhabagrastadera ebam musaphiradera jan'ye, yate dhanaisbaryya kebala tomadera bittasalidera madhye'i punjibhuta na haya. Rasula tomaderake ya dena, ta grahana kara ebam ya nisedha karena, ta theke birata thaka ebam allahake bhaya kara. Niscaya allaha kathora sastidata.
